entities.name: harry

entities.name: hermione

entities.name: umbridge

relationships.description: Harry and Hermione are having an argument about Harry's behavior. ("Oh come off it, Harry! said Herm ione angrily")
Hermione is concerned that Umbridge might be right in chucking Harry out. ("who can blame Umbridge?")
